fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, attack a player
- During the day, use this ability to gain Powerful Defense tonight
- During the day, choose a player to learn their Defense tonight

Attributes
- Gain Powerful defense if any ability is mentioned
- If a player investigates you, and is the only visitor, then you learn who that player is, and their silence is bought, preventing them from speaking tomorrow
